page.title: 03How Space Affects Me
page.content: In 1961 the first man went into space. Yuri Gagirin went into space for 1 hour 48 minuets in Vostok 1. Since then the world has sent lots of spacecrafts into space. America has sent the Apolo spacecrafts and has made a new type of rocket the Shuttle. The Shuttle is basicly the shape and size of D.C.9 and can be used time and time again so that the Americans do not have to spend more money each time they send a rocket in space. The Russians have sent the Vostok rockets into space and have stuck to the same design. The way space has changed me is that of having Sattalites in space which means I can watch t.v live from another country and I can comunicate with other countries witout having to wait for days while the boat travels to the country you want.I just couldn't of done this 25 years ago. Daniel Sparkes.
